text: Cabanatuan longganisa, also known as batutay, is a Filipino beef sausage originating from Cabanatuan City, Nueva Ecija. It can be served sweet (hamonado), garlicky (de recado), or "skinless" (without the casing). It is celebrated in the annual "Longganisa Festival" of Cabanatuan City. ==See also== *Chicken longganisa *Fish longganisa ==References== Category:Philippine sausages
title: Cabanatuan longganisa
